thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 3 of 625
thread.title: Nadia Cockrham

author: Nadia Cockrham
title: Nadia Cockrham
text: I love YesStyle. Plenty of authentic reviews, lots of different vendors with quality goods and great prices! There's been maybe a couple of items that didn't work for me so I just gave them away. But at their prices, it doesn't make sense to return; at least not for me. The rewards program helps ALOT with the different levels, perks for reviewing items and $10 coupons. And I didn't even mention the free international shipping with a $35 or more purchase. Do you know how it easy it is to exceed $35 on this site?!
